/Storage/projects/sps/include/sps/sps_hook.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Hooks as objects.

SPS_Hook provide a OOP way of createing AmigaOS hooks. Instead of filling your entry point manually, a SPS_Hook object provides a

virtual int32 OnEntry(APTR object, APTR message) = 0;

function call which you hook implementation might overload.

A SPS_Hook is not directly derived from a struct Hook! The virtual function makes this impossible. However, a casting operator is available which allows you to cast an SPS_Hook into a struct Hook which you can provide to any function which requires an AmigaOS hook structure. Additionally, GetHook() method provides the same functionality.

Author:
Jürgen Schober
